statements.text: If you think about it, it's a strange thing for a very rich man to do to run for president because it means throwing yourself into a thousand tedious and potentially demeaning situations. For instance, you show up at a debate with the other millionaires who are running for president, and you try to make a joke out of the negative ads they are running against you.
You didn't even use a good picture of me,
so I brought you some pictures.
You wave a few snapshots into the air. You try to turn this debate into something on your own terms. You try to seize the moment.
